Text:
What Types of Personal Data Do We Collect About You?
Personal Identifiers	First and last name
Contact information	Home address; phone number; email addresses
Profile information	Preferences; favorite orders
Login Credentials	Username; passwords
Transaction Data	Items purchased; transaction amount; transaction date/time; whether you used a discount or “promo code”; whether purchase is in-store or online
Payment Information	Credit or Debit Card number; Credit or Debit Card expiration date; Credit or Debit Card security code
User Submissions	Surveys; comments; reviews
Device Location	IP Address; browser or App geolocation data
Usage Data	Date of access; time of access; pages visited; browsing information; interactions with site, app, email, or other marketing; session recordings and replay
Device Information	Type of device; operating system; browser information; internet service provider information; regional and language settings
Audio and Visual Information	In-store security video; customer service audio recordings
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
How Do We Collect Your Personal Data?
Directly From You: We will collect personal data from you directly, such as when you register for an account, place an order, make a payment, sign up for email marketing, participate in a survey, or provide feedback.

From our Partners and Affiliates: We also collect personal data about you from our franchisees, affiliates, and other business partners.

Third Parties: We may also collect information from third party data sellers to enhance or supplement the customer information you provide to us.

Cookies, Pixels, and Other Tracking Technologies: We collect information through tools including cookies and pixels, as well as industry standard tools that record information provided in routine network communications. To learn more about these tools and how you can control them, you can visit: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/cookies-information-websites-store-on-your-computer.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Social Media: We may also collect information about you from social media platforms, which may depend on your privacy settings within those social media platforms.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Here are some ways we commonly use your personal data:

Deliver Products and Services	
Complete your order
Process payments
Deliver orders
Verify your identity
Maintain accounts
Personalize your experience
Facilitate our loyalty program
Respond to Requests	
Provide customer service
Respond to customer feedback
Improve Products and Services	
Make our website and products better
Debug and repair system errors
Customize your experience with us
Security	
Protect our company, customers, and website from malicious or fraudulent activity
Prosecute malicious or fraudulent actors
Marketing	
Serve you ads about products and offers
Inform you of new features or updates from us or third parties
Email or send you marketing material
Push notifications to devices
Customer Communication	Contact you about:
Your account
Feedback you provide
Confirming transactions
Technical or security alerts
This privacy notice or terms of use
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
We may share your personal data with third parties in the following instances:

Franchisees and Affiliates	We share information with our franchisees and affiliates to complete your orders and process your payments. We may also share information with our franchisees to provide local offers and promotions that might interest you.
Third party service providers	We may share your personal data with certain service providers who need access to support our internal business processes. For example, we share information with vendors who provide mailing or email services, tax and accounting services, product fulfillment, delivery services, payments processing, data enhancement services, fraud prevention, maintaining and operating our web site and applications, data analytic services, and other business purposes. We may also share information with marketing partners who help facilitate online advertising. We may also engage vendors or service providers to collect information on our behalf.

When we enter into contracts with these third-party service providers, we typically require them to use your data only as instructed by Papa Johns, to respect and maintain the confidentiality of your data, and to have appropriate technical and organizational information security controls in place.
Promotional Partners	We will share information with third parties who co-sponsor promotions. These partners may send you information about events and products by mail or email.
Mergers and acquisitions	From time to time, Papa Johns and its Franchisees may undergo a corporate sale, merger, acquisition, reorganization, dissolution, or similar event. In these cases, personal data we collect from you may be transferred to an acquirer or successor of Papa Johns or its Franchisee, who may continue to use the data in the ways described in this Privacy Notice.
Legal Compliance	There are other reasons we may disclose your personal data to third parties, such as under the following circumstances:
If we have a good faith belief that we are required by any applicable law, regulation, government authority, or other legal process;
If we need to do so to protect our rights or property, or if necessary to exercise, establish, or defend our legal rights, including to enforce our policies, Terms of Service, or any other agreements;
In connection with routine reporting to our affiliates
To respond to an emergency, or to prevent or protect from harm to you or others; or
Other business purposes, with your consent.
Data obtained through the short code program will not be shared with any third-parties for their marketing reasons/purposes.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Sources. In the 12 months prior to the effective date of this Privacy Notice, we collected, and will continue to collect, Personal Information from the following categories of sources:

Papa Johns store locations
Papa Johns websites and mobile applications
Customer service communications
Loyalty program participation
Third party websites and mobile applications
Third party data suppliers
Commercial business partners
Digital advertising networks
Aggregated delivery services, such as DoorDash
Promotional partners
Social media outlets
Survey providers
Other service providers
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Purposes. We collect and use Personal Information for the following purposes, as more fully described in the above section “How Do We Use Your Personal Data?”:

Deliver products and services
Respond to requests
Improve products and services
Security and fraud prevention
Marketing and promotions
Customer communication
Legal compliance
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected
Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
We may share Personal Information as described above with the following categories of service providers:

Cloud storage providers
IT service providers
Aggregated delivery services
Marketing agencies
Payment processing companies

Professional service providers and contractors
Service providers and other parties associated with mergers and acquisitions
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Sale and Sharing of Personal Information.. We may share the categories of Personal Information listed below with third parties that may use your information for secondary purposes. Our disclosure to those third parties may qualify as a “sale” of personal information under CCPA.

In the 12 months prior to the effective date of this Privacy Notice, we shared, and will continue to share, the following categories of Personal Information with third parties:

Commercial Information: such as products purchased or considered for purchase, and purchase histories or tendencies; and loyalty program participation information;
Personal Identifiers: such as IP address and other online identifiers;
Site or App Usage Information: such as internet connection information, pages visited, advertising data, and site logging information;
Geolocation Information: including precise location data and physical location information when you visit our site or use our apps on your mobile device; and
Inferences Drawn From Above Categories: such as your preferences, characteristics, and purchasing behaviors.
We may share Personal Information as described above with the following categories of third parties:

Marketing agencies
Advertising networks
Social Media companies
Promotional partners
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Opting Out of the Sale of Personal Information.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: ou can ask us to stop selling or sharing your Personal Information with third parties by submitting an opt-out request through this Consumer Rights Privacy Request form or by calling our Privacy Hotline at 833-727-2596 (833-PAPA-596).
Label: Methods to exercise rights
Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: Categories of your Personal Information that we sold to or shared with third parties, or disclosed to service providers for a business purpose; and
Label: Description of Right to Know PI sold / shared

Text: Right to Delete\nCalifornia residents can also ask us to delete Personal Information we have collected about you (subject to exceptions). We refer to these requests as “Deletion Requests”.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: Right to Correct\nCalifornia residents have the right to correct any inaccurate Personal Information we have collected from you.
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: You may update or correct your Personal Information at any time by logging into your Papa Johns account, or by contacting our Customer Care Team by calling toll-free 877-547-7272 (877-547-PAPA).
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Do Not Sell My Personal Information - Right to Opt-Out of Sale or Sharing\nCalifornia residents have the right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of your Personal Information with third parties.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: You can ask us to stop selling or sharing your Personal Information with third parties by submitting an opt-out request here: consumer rights privacy request form or by calling our Privacy Hotline at 833-727-2596 (833-PAPA-596).
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Right to Limit Use or Disclosure of Sensitive Personal Information\nCalifornia residents have the right to limit how businesses use or disclose Sensitive Personal Information about consumers.
Label: Description of Right to Limit use of PI

Text: You can ask us to limit how we use or disclose Sensitive Personal Information about you by submitting a request here: consumer rights privacy request form or by calling our Privacy Hotline at 833-727-2596 (833-PAPA-596).
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Nondiscrimination. California residents have the right not to be discriminated against for exercising any of their data privacy rights detailed above. Papa Johns will not discriminate against any consumer for exercising their rights under CCPA or any applicable privacy law.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: Updates To This Privacy Notice\nWe may update this Privacy Notice from time to time to comply with applicable laws or regulations, or as we make changes to our personal data practices. Please check back periodically for any changes that may impact your personal data.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: Last updated: Novermber 2023
Label: Updated Privacy Policy
